name: Gold Sword
description:
Note

- There is no web version, unfortunately.

- If you get the undefined build error while trying to install the game using Itch's client then you'll have to download it via Itch's website (if you're so inclined).

Controls

- WASD for movement.

- Space to jump.

- Left click for attack.

Features

- There are 3 upgrades in the game including the final golden sword "victory" upgrade.

- There are 3 regions in the game each with unique art, music, and enemies.

More

Made as part of the Metroid Month 15 game jam. The theme was alchemy so I ret-conned a gold sword into the game ASAP.

I'd just like to mention that I joined the jam late and had about 2 weeks to make the game as apposed to the a month. Also this is my first completed and most definitely first publicly available game.
